alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Collingsworth; Donley; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Armstrong, southeastern Gray, southwestern Collingsworth and Donley Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Howardwick to near Lelia Lake. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. This cluster of storms continues to train and redevelop, bringing several rounds of heavy rain. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarendon, Howardwick, Hedley, Lelia Lake and Greenbelt Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
